title: Entertainment: Bars (Izakaya) (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Bars (Izakaya) subcategory within Entertainment. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Izakaya open around 5pm, and some don't close until 6am.
cards.romaji: izakaya wa, t j. gogo goji ni kaiten shi, nakaniwa asa rokuji made aiteiru tokoroga arimasu.
cards.japanese: 居酒屋は、通常午後五時に開店し、中には朝六時まで開いているところがあります。
